<!-- https://simonpcouch.github.io/chores/ -->

The [`chores` package](https://simonpcouch.github.io/chores/) was developed by Simon Couch (who is also the author of the [`ensure`](https://simonpcouch.github.io/ensure/) and [`gander`](https://simonpcouch.github.io/gander/) packages) to "*help you complete repetitive, hard-to-automate tasks quickly*". We covered the [`ellmer` package](https://ellmer.tidyverse.org/index.html) in the previous chapter (see @sec-shiny-ellmer), which is required 

```{r}
#| eval: false 
#| code-fold: false
pak::pak("simonpcouch/chores")
```
